title: A Financial Tragedy Plays Out In Greece: No Money And Debt Is Due
teaser: Greece's bailout money is gone, and it will miss a payment due to the IMF. Linda Wertheimer talks to Joanna Kakissis and Peter Spiegel of The Financial Times about Greece's tenuous hold on the Euro.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
